Description:
When you cross the bridges, an old man who rests to one side looks at you and says:

"Hello young ones... would you spare a little time to listen to this old man's request?

My staff is about to break and I need a new one to continue my travels. I remember I had a spare one that I used in my younger days... it was a very special staff imbued with fire magic, but I left it far from here.

If you get the staff back for me... I'll follow you on your travels."
DescriptionAction: Even old, he seems to be very powerful.

    "SSRewardText": "(Old man) \"That's very kind of you, young lady, in a way you remind me of someone...\n\nAnyway, when I was young I was with a special group of people near the volcano of Velkarath. I'm sure my old staff is still at its main base.\n\nThank you for helping this old man, take these magic shards as thanks.\"",

    "SSRewardText": "(Cornelius) \"Wilbur.... mmm.... ha! Now I remember! It's been too long since the dwarf revolt at the Black Forge.\n\nAs you see, I am already very old, and unlike you... I need a good staff to get around. I left my old staff at the main base of the Burning Hand, in the Velkarath mountains. Could you go get it for me, please.\n\nThanks for helping me, old friend, take these magic shards as thanks.\"",

    "SSRewardText": "(Cornelius) \"Ohh... you're Amelia right? I remember I asked you for another favor some time ago... but now I don't know what it was.\n\nThe truth is that right now what I need most is my old staff. You'll find it Velkarath in my old place, I'm sure you remember where it was. Take these shards, and thank you very much Amelia.\"\n\n(Amelia) \"I will bring you your staff as soon as possible, my friend. And as for the other favor... don't worry, everything is fine now\".",
